thread.section_title: Retail News - Wall Street Journal - Wsj.com
thread.title: Saks Owner Taps CVS Veteran as Next CEO

author: Suzanne Kapner
title: Saks Owner Taps CVS Veteran as Next CEO

organizations.name: saks fifth avenue and lord & taylor

text:
Hudson’s Bay Co. has tapped a drugstore-chain veteran as its next chief executive, as the department store operator turns to a new leader to navigate a difficult retail landscape.
The owner of Saks Fifth Avenue and Lord & Taylor announced that it is hiring Helena Foulkes, president of CVS Pharmacy to fill a post vacated in October by the departure of Jerry Storch. The Wall Street Journal reported the move earlier. Hudson’s Bay’s Chairman Richard Baker has been serving as interim CEO until a replacement was found.
